title: SEAFORT / DESERTER ARREST
description:
Arrest him finally

PERCEPTION (HEARING) red check

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""What?!" The old man's eyes fill wi..."
dialogueTree.text: "What?!" The old man's eyes fill with sudden, unexpected terror at the words: "But you said I would be taken to the..."

links.title: Empathy: "This terror is the sum of all the u..."
links.text: This terror is the sum of all the uncontrollable movements and mood swings he's been exhibiting.

links.title: Shivers: "The wind picks up. The silence on t..."
links.text: The wind picks up. The silence on the water is broken all around you, little shivers of waves appear. The lieutenant continues, like an incantation...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your Wayfarer rights have been sus..."
links.text: "Your Wayfarer rights have been suspended. Information provided to the officers on the scene will be used against you by the prosecution. You will be given legal counsel within one week, and must face court in 44 days -- do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""...""
Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you understand?""
links.text: "Do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""But...""
You: ""Kim, he's afraid...""
links.text: "Kim, he's afraid..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""No, I don't want to! I have to sta..."
links.text: "No, I don't want to! I have to stay here." He looks at the reeds, eyes submerged in growing terror.

links.title: Volition: "He is a brave man -- why is he unra..."
links.text: He is a brave man -- why is he unravelling?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "He's sweating. Beads are forming on..."
links.text: He's sweating. Beads are forming on his forehead.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Pupils are dilated too, eyes gettin..."
links.text: Pupils are dilated too, eyes getting blacker and blacker.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Your confirmation is not required,..."
links.text: "Your confirmation is not required, sir." The lieutenant turns to you. "Now -- on to the boat..."

links.title: You: ""We could all fit in the little boa..."
links.text: "We could all fit in the little boat?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Actually, no..." He scratches his..."
links.text: "Actually, no..." He scratches his head.

links.title: You: "First say: "Does it have room for *..."
links.text: First say: "Does it have room for *three*?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Not really." He shakes his head. "..."
links.text: "Not really." He shakes his head. "We could escort him to the pier, then either one of us can take him inland while the other stays here, but..."

links.title: Logic: "But then -- who watches him, while..."
links.text: But then -- who watches him, while you're coming back here?

links.title: You: ""Who watches him there while I come..."
links.text: "Who watches him there while I come back for you?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You come back for me? How about I..."
links.text: "You come back for me? How about I go and send a boat back for you."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What is this... farce?" He looks a..."
links.text: "What is this... farce?" He looks around, with strange desperation. "This a fucking farce, I can't..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something is happening. Stop."
links.text: Something is happening. Stop.

links.title: Logic: "Lilienne. You could ask her maybe?"
links.text: Lilienne. You could ask her maybe?

links.title: You: ""This is not a problem.""
links.text: "This is not a problem."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is a problem," the lieutenant..."
links.text: "This is a problem," the lieutenant says. "Who watches over him while I come back for you?"

links.title: Logic: "There's something you're not gettin..."
links.text: There's something you're not getting here that he's realizing.

links.title: You: ""But what?""
links.text: "But what?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant shakes his head, fru..."
links.text: The lieutenant shakes his head, frustrated. "Who watches over him there while I come back for you?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe I can just ask Lilienne to w..."
links.text: "Maybe I can just ask Lilienne to watch him?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This is no harmless old man." The..."
links.text: "This is no harmless old man." The lieutenant shakes his head.

links.title: The Deserter: ""This fucking world..." He stares a..."
links.text: "This fucking world..." He stares at something -- who knows what -- in the dust. "This world... what is this?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Below the confusion and rage -- a f..."
links.text: Below the confusion and rage -- a fit of jamais vu, like yours? The thought passes, more pressing matters take its place...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "No, listen! Listen now!"
links.text: No, listen! Listen now!

links.title: You: ""*You* could come back for me. Once..."
links.text: "*You* could come back for me. Once you've taken him to the Precinct."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, no, it would take a whole day..."
links.text: "No, no, it would take a whole day on this island. You go and transport the prisoner, I'll be here. I can escort him to the pier with you."

links.title: You: ""No need to be polite, I'll do it.""
links.text: "No need to be polite, I'll do it."

links.title: The Deserter: ""This world..." The old man interfe..."
links.text: "This world..." The old man interferes again. "What are you *talking* about? Is this..." His voice drowns out in a sudden gush of wind. "Us..."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "The wind is cold. From the east."
links.text: The wind is cold. From the east.

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin is crawling suddenly."
links.text: Your skin is crawling suddenly.

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "A delicate tangle of arms and legs..."
links.text: A delicate tangle of arms and legs unfolds from the reeds, limb by limb -- to then just stand there, moving its scythe-like arms in ghostly silence.

links.title: You: "Blink."
links.text: Blink.

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "It's still there -- an unfolding me..."
links.text: It's still there -- an unfolding mechanism of reed-like chitin. Hovering in place.

links.title: You: ""What is THAT!?!" (Point to it.)"
links.text: "What is THAT!?!" (Point to it.)

links.title: The Deserter: ""What are you talking about?" The o..."
links.text: "What are you talking about?" The old man looks at the reeds, then at you.

links.title: You: ""The giant stick insect!""
links.text: "The giant stick insect!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""There's nothing there." He looks c..."
links.text: "There's nothing there." He looks confused.

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "The stick insect is over three metr..."
links.text: The stick insect is over three metres tall. It looks straight at you with its tiny pinprick eyes and its grotesquely small head.

links.title: Half Light: "You feel your legs shaking under yo..."
links.text: You feel your legs shaking under you and your gun hand rise instinctively...

links.title: You: ""There IS! I see it!""
links.text: "There IS! I see it!"

links.title: The Deserter: ""Tell me what you see, dammit, I ca..."
links.text: "Tell me what you see, dammit, I can't make out one small thing in the reeds..."

links.title: You: ""Kim, can *you* see it?!""
links.text: "Kim, can *you* see it?!"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see it.""
links.text: "I can see it."

links.title: Volition: "Four simple words -- thank god. If..."
links.text: Four simple words -- thank god. If he can see, then you're not insane.

links.title: The Deserter: "...but Lieutenant Kitsuragi is not..."
links.text: ...but Lieutenant Kitsuragi is not here. There is only the old straddler. He turns his black eyes to you and says: "Kim who? There's no Kim here either."

links.title: Logic: "He's right. You've lost your mind."
links.text: He's right. You've lost your mind.

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "There is only the old man -- and th..."
links.text: There is only the old man -- and the giant stick insect spinning slowly -- in absolute silence -- it's long and thin limbs...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Beckoning you to come to it."
links.text: Beckoning you to come to it.

links.title: You: ""Cuno, can *you* see it?!""
links.text: "Cuno, can *you* see it?!"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, I can fuckin' see it!""
links.text: "Yeah, I can fuckin' see it!"

links.title: Volition: "Thank god. If *he* can see, then *m..."
links.text: Thank god. If *he* can see, then *maybe* you're not insane.

links.title: Logic: "But that means..."
links.text: But that means...

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "It's really there. Spinning slowly..."
links.text: It's really there. Spinning slowly -- in absolute silence -- its limbs long and slender...

links.title: Cuno: ""Be *very* careful...." the kid whi..."
links.text: "Be *very* careful...." the kid whispers, then takes a step toward the giant arthropod...

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "It's really there. Spinning slowly..."
links.text: It's really there. Spinning slowly -- in absolute silence -- its limbs long and slender...

links.title: Logic: "If he can see it too, then you're n..."
links.text: If he can see it too, then you're not *totally* insane.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "But that would mean..."
links.text: But that would mean...

links.title: The Deserter: ""See what exactly?! A bug?" He does..."
links.text: "See what exactly?! A bug?" He does not understand.

links.title: You: ""I've finally gone insane..." (Put..."
links.text: "I've finally gone insane..." (Put your head in your hands.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "You feel the lieutenant's hand on y..."
links.text: You feel the lieutenant's hand on your back. And then you hear him say four words:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see it.""
links.text: "I can see it."

links.title: Volition: "Thank god. If he can see, then you'..."
links.text: Thank god. If he can see, then you're not insane.

links.title: Logic: "But that means..."
links.text: But that means...

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "It's really there. Spinning slowly..."
links.text: It's really there. Spinning slowly -- in absolute silence -- its limbs long and slender.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be very, *very* careful," the lieu..."
links.text: "Be very, *very* careful," the lieutenant whispers, then takes a step toward the giant arthropod...

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "It's really there. Spinning slowly..."
links.text: It's really there. Spinning slowly -- in absolute silence -- its limbs long and slender.

links.title: Logic: "If he can see it too, then you're n..."
links.text: If he can see it too, then you're not *totally* insane.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "But that would mean..."
links.text: But that would mean...

links.title: Cuno: "You feel the kid tug on your sleeve..."
links.text: You feel the kid tug on your sleeve -- and in the darkness -- four words:

links.title: Cuno: ""I can see it.""
links.text: "I can see it."

links.title: Volition: "Thank god. If he can see, then you'..."
links.text: Thank god. If he can see, then you're not insane.

links.title: The Deserter: ""Guess you have, droite." You hear..."
links.text: "Guess you have, droite." You hear the old man's voice in the dark. "I don't see anything there -- does this mean I'm not under arrest?"

links.title: Volition: "You're NOT insane."
links.text: You're NOT insane.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It's the cryptid!"
links.text: It's the cryptid!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "*Or* you're high."
links.text: *Or* you're high.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "It's too late, you quit drinking to..."
links.text: It's too late, you quit drinking too late!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Delirium! It's delirium from the bo..."
links.text: Delirium! It's delirium from the booze!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "You're high. Breathe in, you're jus..."
links.text: You're high. Breathe in, you're just high!

links.title: You: ""No, I can't be insane -- you're wr..."
links.text: "No, I can't be insane -- you're wrong."

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "But you *can*. You open your eyes a..."
links.text: But you *can*. You open your eyes and it's still there -- a giant stick insect, spinning slowly -- -- its limbs long and slender...

links.title: You: ""No, it's the damn cryptid, the...""
links.text: "No, it's the damn cryptid, the..."

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "...phasmid! You open your eyes and..."
links.text: ...phasmid! You open your eyes and there still is, spinning slowly -- in absolute  silence -- its limbs long and slender...

links.title: You: ""Oh god, I'm too high...""
links.text: "Oh god, I'm too high..."

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "Way too high. You open your eyes an..."
links.text: Way too high. You open your eyes and it's still there -- a giant stick insect, spinning slowly -- its limbs long and slender. Silent as death...

links.title: You: ""My wife said I'm insane too. That'..."
links.text: "My wife said I'm insane too. That's why we can't..."

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "...be together. You open your eyes..."
links.text: ...be together. You open your eyes and it's still there -- a giant stick insect, spinning slowly -- its limbs long and slender....

links.title: You: ""I don't know what this means...""
links.text: "I don't know what this means..."

links.title: Insulindian Phasmid: "No one would. You open your eyes an..."
links.text: No one would. You open your eyes and it's still there -- a giant stick insect, spinning slowly -- its limbs long and slender. Silent as death...

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No! It's the cryptid!"
links.text: No! It's the cryptid!

links.title: Volition: "No. It can't be!"
links.text: No. It can't be!

links.title: Volition: "My god... maybe you *are*."
links.text: My god... maybe you *are*.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "No, it's the cryptid!"
links.text: No, it's the cryptid!

links.title: Half Light: "You feel your legs shaking under yo..."
links.text: You feel your legs shaking under you and your gun hand move to your holster -- to grab the gun...

links.title: Half Light: "You feel your legs shaking under yo..."
links.text: You feel your legs shaking under you and your gun hand move to your holster -- but you don't have a gun...

links.title: You: ""I don't know what the hell that is..."
links.text: "I don't know what the hell that is..."

links.title: You: ""A giant bug, watch out!""
links.text: "A giant bug, watch out!"

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right...""
links.text: "Maybe you're right..."

links.title: You: ""*I* could come back for you. Once..."
links.text: "*I* could come back for you. Once I've taken him to the Precinct."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Okay," the lieutenant nods. "How a..."
links.text: "Okay," the lieutenant nods. "How about *I* take him to the Precinct and you wait on the island?"

links.title: You: ""I'll do it, let's not get into thi..."
links.text: "I'll do it, let's not get into this."

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right, okay...""
links.text: "Maybe you're right, okay..."

links.title: You: "Wait..."
links.text: Wait...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "There it is again, to your north, a..."
links.text: There it is again, to your north, as it has been since you came to the coast -- the reeds whisper, stalks rubbing against each other. But then, in the middle of it...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Something completely different. It..."
links.text: Something completely different. It sounds like a bow, very slowly being drawn against the strings of a violin. A very small violin made of reeds and rushes.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "... and then it's gone. Drowned out..."
links.text: ... and then it's gone. Drowned out by the lieutenant's voice -- "Maybe there is room for three on the boat..."

links.title: You: ""Shush, Kim! Do you hear that?""
links.text: "Shush, Kim! Do you hear that?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What are you *talking* about? Is t..."
links.text: "What are you *talking* about? Is this..." The old man's voice drowns in a sudden gust of wind. "...really us..."

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin crawls."
links.text: Your skin crawls.

links.title: You: ""Okay, so you're saying we can all..."
links.text: "Okay, so you're saying we can all fit in there?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should try first. There is a pr..."
links.text: "We should try first. There is a prisoner transfer protocol that requires two..."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You thought you heard something but..."
links.text: You thought you heard something but it's just the reeds...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Maybe we could all fit in there......"
links.text: "Maybe we could all fit in there..." the lieutenant says.

links.title: Half Light: "He's not afraid of jail. He's afrai..."
links.text: He's not afraid of jail. He's afraid of something else.

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Like parting from a loved one."
links.text: Like parting from a loved one.

links.title: You: ""Do you understand, sir?""
links.text: "Do you understand, sir?"

links.title: Composure: "The sum of all the erratic movement..."
links.text: The sum of all the erratic movements, fidgeting and mood swings he's been exhibiting...

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""What?!" The old man's eyes fill wi..."
dialogueTree.text: "What?!" The old man's eyes fill with sudden, unexpected terror at the words: "But you said I would be taken to the, uhm, the..."

links.title: Empathy: "This terror -- the sum of all the u..."
links.text: This terror -- the sum of all the uncontrollable movements and mood swings he's been exhibiting...

links.title: Shivers: "The wind picks up. The silence on t..."
links.text: The wind picks up. The silence on the water is broken all around you, little shivers of waves appear...

links.title: You: ""Your Wayfarer rights have been sus..."
links.text: "Your Wayfarer rights have been suspended. Information provided to the officer on the scene will be used against you by the prosecution."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I..." He looks around, confused."
links.text: "I..." He looks around, confused.

links.title: You: ""You will be provided legal counsel..."
links.text: "You will be provided legal counsel within one week, and must face court in 44 days."

links.title: Cuno: ""Do you understand?""
links.text: "Do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""...""
You: ""Do you understand, sir?""
links.text: "Do you understand, sir?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""No... I don't want to. I have to s..."
links.text: "No... I don't want to. I have to stay *here*." He looks at the reeds, eyes full of terror.

links.title: Volition: "He is a brave man -- why is he unra..."
links.text: He is a brave man -- why is he unravelling?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "He's sweating. Beads are forming on..."
links.text: He's sweating. Beads are forming on his forehead.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Pupils are dilated too, eyes gettin..."
links.text: Pupils are dilated too, eyes getting blacker and blacker...

links.title: Cuno: ""We don't need your permisson," the..."
links.text: "We don't need your permisson," the kid turns to you. "We do need to talk about that *boat* though. How are we gonna take him?"

links.title: You: ""We could all fit in the little boa..."
links.text: "We could all fit in the little boat?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, actually -- no." He scratche..."
links.text: "Yeah, actually -- no." He scratches his head. "It would go down."

links.title: You: ""Does the boat have room for three?""
links.text: "Does the boat have room for three?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah -- no." He shakes his head. "..."
links.text: "Yeah -- no." He shakes his head. "Only two are gonna fit in that fucker. I guess *you* could take him back, but..." He squints, realizing something.

links.title: Logic: "Wait! But then -- who watches over..."
links.text: Wait! But then -- who watches over him while you're coming back?

links.title: You: ""But then who watches him -- there..."
links.text: "But then who watches him -- there -- while I come back for you?"

links.title: Cuno: "He squints harder. "Fuck, it's the..."
links.text: He squints harder. "Fuck, it's the three piggies and a boat problem..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What is this... farce?" He looks a..."
links.text: "What is this... farce?" He looks around, with some desperation. "This a fucking farce, I can't..."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Something is happening. Stop."
links.text: Something is happening. Stop.

links.title: Logic: "Lilienne. You could ask her."
links.text: Lilienne. You could ask her.

links.title: You: ""This is not a problem.""
links.text: "This is not a problem."

links.title: Cuno: ""This *is* a problem," the kid says..."
links.text: "This *is* a problem," the kid says. "Cuno's literally had this problem. In a fuckin' textbook. When he went to *kiddie school*. This is that three piggies and a boat shit..."

links.title: Logic: "There's something you're not gettin..."
links.text: There's something you're not getting here that he has just realized.

links.title: You: ""*But* what? There's something I'm..."
links.text: "*But* what? There's something I'm not getting, right?"

links.title: Cuno: "His eyes shoot wide open. "Cuno und..."
links.text: His eyes shoot wide open. "Cuno understands what's wrong. Who watches this fuckin' killer in the village, while you come back for me?"

links.title: You: ""Maybe I can just ask Lilienne to w..."
links.text: "Maybe I can just ask Lilienne to watch him?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Watch this *killer*?" The kid shak..."
links.text: "Watch this *killer*?" The kid shakes his head and points to him.

links.title: The Deserter: ""This fucking world..." He stares a..."
links.text: "This fucking world..." He stares at something -- who knows what -- in the dust. "This world... what is this?"

links.title: Conceptualization: "Below the confusion and rage -- a f..."
links.text: Below the confusion and rage -- a fit of jamais vu, like yours? The thought passes, more pressing matters take its place...

links.title: You: ""*You* could come back for me. Once..."
links.text: "*You* could come back for me. Once you've taken him to the Precinct."

links.title: Cuno: "The kid looks at you blankly. Then..."
links.text: The kid looks at you blankly. Then at the old man. "You fuckin' with me? Coz I can. I *can* take him."

links.title: You: ""Yeah, actually, that will look bad.""
links.text: "Yeah, actually, that will look bad."

links.title: The Deserter: ""This fucking world..." The old man..."
links.text: "This fucking world..." The old man interferes again. "What are you *talking* about? Is this..." His voice drowns out in a sudden gush of wind. "Us..."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Cold. From the East."
links.text: Cold. From the East.

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin is crawling suddenly."
links.text: Your skin is crawling suddenly.

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right...""
links.text: "Maybe you're right..."

links.title: You: ""*I* could come back for you. Once..."
links.text: "*I* could come back for you. Once I've taken him to the Precinct."

links.title: Cuno: ""Uhm -- how about the Cuno comes ba..."
links.text: "Uhm -- how about the Cuno comes back for *you*?"

links.title: You: ""I can't let a kid go and take a mu..."
links.text: "I can't let a kid go and take a murder suspect to the station."

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right...""
links.text: "Maybe you're right..."

links.title: You: "Wait..."
links.text: Wait...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "There it is again, to your north, a..."
links.text: There it is again, to your north, as it has been since you came to the coast -- the reeds whisper, stalks rubbing against each other. But then, in the middle of it...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Something completely different. It..."
links.text: Something completely different. It sounds like a bow, very slowly being drawn against the strings of a violin. A very small violin made of reeds and rushes.

links.title: Cuno: "...and then it's gone. Drowned out..."
links.text: ...and then it's gone. Drowned out by the kid's voice -- "Maybe there is room for three on the boat..."

links.title: You: ""Shush, Cuno! Do you hear that?""
links.text: "Shush, Cuno! Do you hear that?"

links.title: Cuno: ""What?""
links.text: "What?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What a farce! What are you *talkin..."
links.text: "What a farce! What are you *talking* about? Is this..." The old man's voice drowns in a sudden gust of wind. "... really us..."

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin crawls."
links.text: Your skin crawls.

links.title: You: ""You're saying we can all fit in th..."
links.text: "You're saying we can all fit in there?"

links.title: Cuno: ""Why not?""
links.text: "Why not?"

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You thought you heard something but..."
links.text: You thought you heard something but it's just the reeds.

links.title: Cuno: ""Maybe we could all fit in there...""
links.text: "Maybe we could all fit in there..."

links.title: Half Light: "He's not afraid of jail. He's afrai..."
links.text: He's not afraid of jail. He's afraid of something else...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Like parting from a loved one."
links.text: Like parting from a loved one.

links.title: Composure: "The sum of all the erratic movement..."
links.text: The sum of all the erratic movements, fidgeting and mood swings he's been exhibiting...

dialogueTree.title: The Deserter: ""Huh?" He leans closer with a stran..."
dialogueTree.text: "Huh?" He leans closer with a strange expression on his face.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Now that you say them, the words fe..."
links.text: Now that you say them, the words feel like tin, heavy, they're coming from the bottom of you. You've said them half a thousand times...

links.title: You: "(Say:) "You will be taken to the ne..."
links.text: (Say:) "You will be taken to the nearest precinct holding area for preliminary investigation."

links.title: The Deserter: ""But..." His eyes fill with sudden..."
links.text: "But..." His eyes fill with sudden terror: "You said I would be taken to the, uhm, the..."

links.title: Empathy: "This terror, the sum of all the unc..."
links.text: This terror, the sum of all the uncontrollable movements and mood swings he's been exhibiting...

links.title: Shivers: "The wind picks up. The silence on t..."
links.text: The wind picks up. The silence on the water is broken, little shivers of waves appear...

links.title: You: "(Say:) "Your Wayfarer rights have b..."
links.text: (Say:) "Your Wayfarer rights have been suspended. Information provided to the officer on the scene will be used against you by the prosecution."

links.title: The Deserter: ""...""
You: ""You will be provided legal counsel..."
links.text: "You will be provided legal counsel within one week, and must face court in 44 days -- do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""I..." He looks around, confused."
links.text: "I..." He looks around, confused.

links.title: You: ""Do you understand?""
links.text: "Do you understand?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""...""
You: ""You're afraid...""
links.text: "You're afraid..."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What if I don't want to? What if I..."
links.text: "What if I don't want to? What if I want to stay here?" He looks at you, eyes submerged in terror.

links.title: Volition: "How is this brave man unravelling?"
links.text: How is this brave man unravelling?

links.title: Perception (Sight): "Look, he's sweating. Beads are form..."
links.text: Look, he's sweating. Beads are forming on his forehead.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Pupils are dilated too, eyes gettin..."
links.text: Pupils are dilated too, eyes getting blacker and blacker...

links.title: You: ""First, you need to come with me to..."
links.text: "First, you need to come with me to the boat."

links.title: The Deserter: ""I can't, my rubber dinghy..." He p..."
links.text: "I can't, my rubber dinghy..." He points to the broken tyre. "My tyre is broken, it won't inflate."

links.title: Composure: "He's regressing, fast."
links.text: He's regressing, fast.

links.title: Logic: "He's been stuck on the island after..."
links.text: He's been stuck on the island after the tyre broke...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Stop. Something is happening."
links.text: Stop. Something is happening.

links.title: You: ""Let's go. I don't have handcuffs,..."
links.text: "Let's go. I don't have handcuffs, so you walk in front of me."

links.title: The Deserter: ""What a farce. What are you *talkin..."
links.text: "What a farce. What are you *talking* about -- handcuffs? Is this..." The old man's voice drowns in a sudden gush of wind.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Cold. From the East."
links.text: Cold. From the East.

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin crawls."
links.text: Your skin crawls.

links.title: You: ""Can you stay here while I go inlan..."
links.text: "Can you stay here while I go inland and find you transport?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""What a farce. What are you *talkin..."
links.text: "What a farce. What are you *talking* about -- inland? Is this..." The old man's voice drowns in a sudden gush of wind.

links.title: You: "Wait..."
links.text: Wait...

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "There it is again, to your north, a..."
links.text: There it is again, to your north, as it has been since you came to the coast -- the reeds whisper, stalks rubbing against each other. But then, in the middle of it...

links.title: You: "What?"
links.text: What?

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "Something completely different. It..."
links.text: Something completely different. It sounds like a bow, very slowly being drawn against the strings of a violin. A very small violin made of reeds and rushes.

links.title: You: ""Mr. Dros, do you hear that?""
links.text: "Mr. Dros, do you hear that?"

links.title: The Deserter: ""A farce -- this world. Is this......"
links.text: "A farce -- this world. Is this... is this us..." His voice drowns out in a sudden gust of wind.

links.title: Shivers: "Your skin crawls."
links.text: Your skin crawls.

links.title: You: ""Mr. Dros, time to go.""
links.text: "Mr. Dros, time to go."

links.title: Perception (Hearing): "You thought you heard something, bu..."
links.text: You thought you heard something, but it's just the reeds. Now -- how do we do this?

links.title: Half Light: "He's not afraid of jail. He's afrai..."
links.text: He's not afraid of jail. He's afraid of something else...

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Like parting from a loved one."
links.text: Like parting from a loved one.

links.title: You: ""Do you understand, sir?""
links.text: "Do you understand, sir?"

links.title: Composure: "The sum of all the erratic, involun..."
links.text: The sum of all the erratic, involuntary movements and mood swings he's been exhibiting...

links.title: Inland Empire: "The words feel heavy, like they're..."
links.text: The words feel heavy, like they're coming from the bottom of you. You've said them half a thousand times...

links.title: Conceptualization: "It feels like a *spell*."
links.text: It feels like a *spell*.

dialogueTree.title: Esprit de Corps: "... is what you plan to say. Before..."
dialogueTree.text: ... is what you plan to say. Before you can get past 'you're under', the lieutenant interrupts you:

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer -- are we sure?" His voice..."
links.text: "Officer -- are we sure?" His voice is lowered. "We could maybe get more."

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "We've been thorough enough...."
links.text: (Nod.) "We've been thorough enough."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods back and turns to the man s..."
links.text: He nods back and turns to the man sitting on the log. "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of the Krenel colonel. You will be taken to the nearest precinct holding area for preliminary investigation."

links.title: You: "(Turn to the suspect.) "One more th..."
links.text: (Turn to the suspect.) "One more thing, Mr. Dros..."

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man looks at his rifle in y..."
links.text: The old man looks at his rifle in your hands -- a little startled for some reason...

links.title: Empathy: "You've startled him... maybe it was..."
links.text: You've startled him... maybe it was the silence? He quickly gathers himself. Still -- what could he be afraid of?

links.title: The Deserter: "The old man looks at his rifle in t..."
links.text: The old man looks at his rifle in the sand, then up at you -- a little startled for some reason...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Officer..." The lieutenant interru..."
links.text: "Officer..." The lieutenant interrupts you at *under*. His voice is hushed. "Are we sure? We could maybe get more..."

dialogueTree.title: Esprit de Corps: "... is what you plan to say. Before..."
dialogueTree.text: ... is what you plan to say. Before you can get past 'you're under', the kid interrupts you:

links.title: Cuno: ""You sure?" He whispers. "You sure..."
links.text: "You sure?" He whispers. "You sure we got it all?"

links.title: You: "(Nod.) "We've been thorough.""
links.text: (Nod.) "We've been thorough."

links.title: Cuno: ""Right." He turns to him. "Give him..."
links.text: "Right." He turns to him. "Give him his rights."

links.title: Rhetoric: "The words come to you, clear as day..."
links.text: The words come to you, clear as day.

links.title: You: ""Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are un..."
links.text: "Iosef Lilianovich Dros, you are under arrest for the murder of the mercenary leader, Kortenaer. You will be taken to the nearest precinct holding area for preliminary investigation."

links.title: You: "(Turn to the suspect.) "One more th..."
links.text: (Turn to the suspect.) "One more thing, Mr. Dros..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Hey..." The kid interrupts you at..."
links.text: "Hey..." The kid interrupts you at 'you're under', his voice subdued. "You sure we got all this shit?"

dialogueTree.title: Inland Empire: "... is what you want to say. You ca..."
dialogueTree.text: ... is what you want to say. You can barely get to 'you're under...' when you suddenly get weary...

links.title: Logic: "Did you get *everything*, detective..."
links.text: Did you get *everything*, detective?

links.title: Reaction Speed: "It may be too late later, the circu..."
links.text: It may be too late later, the circumstances change, are you sure we're done here?

links.title: You: "(No, I got everything I need, say:)..."
links.text: (No, I got everything I need, say:) "Iosef Lilianovich Dros -- you are under arrest for the murder of the Krenel colonel."

links.title: You: "(Turn to the suspect.) "One more th..."
links.text: (Turn to the suspect.) "One more thing, Mr. Dros..."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "... is what you want to say. You ge..."
links.text: ... is what you want to say. You get to 'you're under...' when a warning rings in the back of your head: did you get everything?

links.title: Half Light: "... is what you want to say, but wa..."
links.text: ... is what you want to say, but wait god damn it! With the words 'you're under...' still stuck in your throat you think: what if I *missed* something?
